tool_description: US Zip Codes, Cities, States and Counties boundaries API, which provides info in common GeoJson format for instant integration with existing maps like Google, etc., or with your custom application.
name: MapReflex
title: MapReflex

api_list.name: zipCodesSearchInBoundingBox
api_list.description: Get ZIP Codes boundaries in provided bounding box (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: northEast
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of north-east corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.81,-73.41

required_parameters.name: southWest
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of south-west corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.62,-74.73

optional_parameters.name: intersect
optional_parameters.description: Include areas that intersect with bounding box

api_list.name: zipCodesListByState
api_list.description: Get a plain list of ZIP Codes of a state. Result is a plain list of ZIP Codes, not GeoJSON format. To retrieve boundaries of all ZIP Codes of a state you may query method "zipCodesByIds" with a portion of current method output.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name abbreviation. Test example: NY

api_list.name: zipCodesSearchInRadius
api_list.description: Get ZIP Codes boundaries in circle with given radius (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of radius center. Test example: -74.72

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude of radius center. Test example: 40.61

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius size in miles. Min value is 1, max value is 50 miles.

api_list.name: countiesByIds
api_list.description: Get boundaries of given Counties (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: Array of comma separated county ids. Test example: 20109,20111,20113

api_list.name: countyByNameAndState
api_list.description: Get boundaries of County by name and state (in GeoJSON format).  For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Full county name. Test example: Logan

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name abbreviation. Test example: KS

api_list.name: countiesByState
api_list.description: Get Counties boundaries of state (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name abbreviation. Test example: TX

api_list.name: countiesSearchInBoundingBox
api_list.description: Get Counties boundaries in provided bounding box (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: northEast
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of north-east corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.81,-73.41

required_parameters.name: southWest
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of south-west corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.62,-74.73

optional_parameters.name: intersect
optional_parameters.description: Include areas that intersect with bounding box

api_list.name: countiesSearchInRadius
api_list.description: Get Counties boundaries in circle with given radius (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius size in miles. Min value is 1, max value is 50 miles.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of radius center. Test example: -74.72

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude of radius center. Test example: 40.61

api_list.name: placesSearchInRadius
api_list.description: Get Places boundaries in circle with given radius (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude of radius center. Test example: 40.61

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of radius center. Test example: -74.72

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius size in miles. Min value is 1, max value is 50 miles.

api_list.name: placeByNameAndState
api_list.description: Get boundaries of Place by name and state (in GeoJSON format).  For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Full place name. Test example: Madison

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name abbreviation. Test example: AL

api_list.name: zipCodesByIds
api_list.description: Get boundaries of given ZIP Codes (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: Array of comma separated zipCodes/ids. Max size is 200. Test example: 10021,10022,10023

optional_parameters.name: properties
optional_parameters.description: Customize feature properties to include. In case of ZIP Code - set of [\"zip\", \"centroid\", \"aland\", \"awater\"]. Default value includes all properties: zip,centroid,aland,awater .

api_list.name: placesByIds
api_list.description: Get boundaries of given Places (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: ids
required_parameters.description: Array of comma separated place ids. Test example: 0126896,0162688,0145784

api_list.name: placesListByState
api_list.description: Get a plain list of Places of a state. Result is a plain list of place ids, not GeoJSON format. To retrieve boundaries of all Places of a state you may query method "placesByIds" with a portion of current method output.

required_parameters.name: state
required_parameters.description: State name abbreviation. Test example: NY

api_list.name: placesSearchInBoundingBox
api_list.description: Get Places boundaries in provided bounding box (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: northEast
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of north-east corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.81,-73.41

required_parameters.name: southWest
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of south-west corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.62,-74.73

optional_parameters.name: intersect
optional_parameters.description: Include areas that intersect with bounding box

api_list.name: statesSearchInRadius
api_list.description: Get States boundaries in circle with given radius (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Latitude of radius center. Test example: 40.61

required_parameters.name: radius
required_parameters.description: Radius size in miles. Min value is 1, max value is 50 miles.

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: Longitude of radius center. Test example: -74.72

api_list.name: statesSearchInBoundingBox
api_list.description: Get States boundaries in provided bounding box (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: northEast
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of north-east corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.81,-73.41

required_parameters.name: southWest
required_parameters.description: Coordinates of south-west corner of bounding box. Test example: 40.62,-74.73

optional_parameters.name: intersect
optional_parameters.description: Include areas that intersect with bounding box

api_list.name: states
api_list.description: Get boundaries of given States (in GeoJSON format). By default, returns boundaries of all States.  For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

optional_parameters.name: states
optional_parameters.description: Array of comma separated State name abbreviations. If the parameter is absent, boundaries of all States requested. Test example: NY,CA,DE,AK

api_list.name: zipCodesByCounty
api_list.description: Get ZIP Codes boundaries of County (in GeoJSON format). For a quick view, copy and paste results: http://geojsonlint.com

required_parameters.name: countyIds
required_parameters.description: Array of  County ids. Test example: 20109
